thiefworld.agents

Class Pheromone

  • java.lang.Object
    • thiefworld.agents.Agent
      • thiefworld.agents.Pheromone
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable

    public class Pheromone
extends Agent
    The pheromone trail agent. It consists of a single pheromone drop with a certain strength and a certain type dependent on the agent that drops it.
    Author:
    Stefan Adrian Boronea
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Pheromone()
      Creates a new unknown type pheromone drop using the default strength of one unit.

      Creates a new specific type pheromone using a specified stength.

      Creates a new specific type pheromone using a specified stength.
      Pheromone(PheromoneType type)
      Creates a new specific type pheromone drop using the default strength of one unit.

        private static double defaultPheromoneStrength

      • pheromoneDecayRate

        private static double pheromoneDecayRate

      • serialVersionUID

        private static final long serialVersionUID
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • comingFromNest

        private boolean comingFromNest
        Flag describing whether the pheromone was placed on the path from the nest towards a food source.

      • returningFromFoodSource

        private boolean returningFromFoodSource
        Flag describing whether the pheromone was placed on the path returning from the food source or going towards the food source.

      • strength

        private double strength
        The pheromone strength. This will eventually influence the number of time steps in which it completely decays.

      • type

        private PheromoneType type
        The type of pheromone.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pheromone

        public Pheromone()
        Creates a new unknown type pheromone drop using the default strength of one unit.

      • Pheromone

        public Pheromone(double strength,
         PheromoneType type)
        Creates a new specific type pheromone using a specified stength. The trip direction is towards the food source.
        Parameters:
        strength - the pheromone strength.
        type - the pheromone type.

      • Pheromone

         PheromoneType type,

        Parameters:
        strength -
        type -
        returningFromFoodSource -

      • isReturningFromFoodSource

        public boolean isReturningFromFoodSource()
        Checks if the pheromone was dropped on the way to the nest or not.
        Returns:
        true if the pheromone was dropped on the way back from a food source and false if it was dropped on the way from the nest to the food source.

      • setComingFromNest

        public void setComingFromNest(boolean comingFromNest)

      • setReturningFromFoodSource

        Sets if the pheromone was dropped on the way to the nest or not.
        Parameters:
        returningFromFoodSource - true if the pheromone was dropped on the way back from a food source and false if it was dropped on the way from the nest to the food source.
